issue.title: [CF 491] READ ME: 5.1.0 initial feedback
issue.body:
5.1.0 is finally here. If you have downloaded this version, please please please comment here telling me if you noticed any immediate problems on the first run of it (please post also if you didn't notice anything).

You can also post bugs with 5.1.0 in here (for now, I will close this ticket once I get some initial feedback about it).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #491 | Raw

comments.body:
TellMeWhen before update: http://i.imgur.com/qa7S8.jpg

TellMeWhen after update: http://i.imgur.com/AoHCF.jpg

Note that in the second picture TellMeWhen isn't in config mode. That's how it actually looks like. I included the first picture so you maybe can see the pattern of what icons are shown and what icons are hidden.
